00068 /* swap */
00069 #define WIN_NONE_OK     0
00070 #define WIN_BACK_OK     1
00071 #define WIN_FRONT_OK    2
00072 #define WIN_BOTH_OK     3
00073 
00074 /* ******************* drawing, overlays *************** */
00075 
00076 
00077 static void wm_paintcursor_draw(bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00078 {
00079     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00080     
00081     if (wm->paintcursors.first) {
00082         wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00083         bScreen *screen = win->screen;
00084         wmPaintCursor *pc;
00085 
00086         if (screen->subwinactive == ar->swinid) {
00087             for (pc = wm->paintcursors.first; pc; pc = pc->next) {
00088                 if (pc->poll == NULL || pc->poll(C)) {
00089                     ARegion *ar_other = CTX_wm_region(C);
00090                     if (ELEM(win->grabcursor, GHOST_kGrabWrap, GHOST_kGrabHide)) {
00091                         int x = 0, y = 0;
00092                         wm_get_cursor_position(win, &x, &y);
00093                         pc->draw(C,
00094                                  x - ar_other->winrct.xmin,
00095                                  y - ar_other->winrct.ymin,
00096                                  pc->customdata);
00097                     }
00098                     else {
00099                         pc->draw(C,
00100                                  win->eventstate->x - ar_other->winrct.xmin,
00101                                  win->eventstate->y - ar_other->winrct.ymin,
00102                                  pc->customdata);
00103                     }
00104                 }
00105             }
00106         }
00107     }
00108 }

00112 static void wm_area_mark_invalid_backbuf(ScrArea *sa)
00113 {
00114     if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D)
00115         ((View3D *)sa->spacedata.first)->flag |= V3D_INVALID_BACKBUF;
00116 }
00117 
00118 static int wm_area_test_invalid_backbuf(ScrArea *sa)
00119 {
00120     if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D)
00121         return (((View3D *)sa->spacedata.first)->flag & V3D_INVALID_BACKBUF);
00122     else
00123         return 1;
00124 }
00125 
00126 static void wm_region_test_render_do_draw(ScrArea *sa, ARegion *ar)
00127 {
00128     if (sa->spacetype == SPACE_VIEW3D) {
00129         RegionView3D *rv3d = ar->regiondata;
00130         RenderEngine *engine = (rv3d) ? rv3d->render_engine : NULL;
00131 
00132         if (engine && (engine->flag & RE_ENGINE_DO_DRAW)) {
00133             ar->do_draw = 1;
00134             engine->flag &= ~RE_ENGINE_DO_DRAW;
00135         }
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00139 /********************** draw all **************************/
00140 /* - reference method, draw all each time                 */
00141 
00142 static void wm_method_draw_full(bContext *C, wmWindow *win)
00143 {
00144     bScreen *screen = win->screen;
00145     ScrArea *sa;
00146     ARegion *ar;
00147 
00148     /* draw area regions */
00149     for (sa = screen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next) {
00150         CTX_wm_area_set(C, sa);
00151 
00152         for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00153             if (ar->swinid) {
00154                 CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar);
00155                 ED_region_do_draw(C, ar);
00156                 wm_paintcursor_draw(C, ar);
00157                 ED_area_overdraw_flush(sa, ar);
00158                 CTX_wm_region_set(C, NULL);
00159             }
00160         }
00161         
00162         wm_area_mark_invalid_backbuf(sa);
00163         CTX_wm_area_set(C, NULL);
00164     }
00165 
00166     ED_screen_draw(win);
00167     ED_area_overdraw(C);
00168 
00169     /* draw overlapping regions */
00170     for (ar = screen->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00171         if (ar->swinid) {
00172             CTX_wm_menu_set(C, ar);
00173             ED_region_do_draw(C, ar);
00174             CTX_wm_menu_set(C, NULL);
00175         }
00176     }
00177 
00178     if (screen->do_draw_gesture)
00179         wm_gesture_draw(win);
00180 }
00181 
00182 /****************** draw overlap all **********************/
00183 /* - redraw marked areas, and anything that overlaps it   */
00184 /* - it also handles swap exchange optionally, assuming   */
00185 /*   that on swap no clearing happens and we get back the */
00186 /*   same buffer as we swapped to the front               */
00187 
00188 /* mark area-regions to redraw if overlapped with rect */
00189 static void wm_flush_regions_down(bScreen *screen, rcti *dirty)
00190 {
00191     ScrArea *sa;
00192     ARegion *ar;
00193 
00194     for (sa = screen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next) {
00195         for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00196             if (BLI_isect_rcti(dirty, &ar->winrct, NULL)) {
00197                 ar->do_draw = RGN_DRAW;
00198                 memset(&ar->drawrct, 0, sizeof(ar->drawrct));
00199                 ar->swap = WIN_NONE_OK;
00200             }
00201         }
00202     }
00203 }
00204 
00205 /* mark menu-regions to redraw if overlapped with rect */
00206 static void wm_flush_regions_up(bScreen *screen, rcti *dirty)
00207 {
00208     ARegion *ar;
00209     
00210     for (ar = screen->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00211         if (BLI_isect_rcti(dirty, &ar->winrct, NULL)) {
00212             ar->do_draw = RGN_DRAW;
00213             memset(&ar->drawrct, 0, sizeof(ar->drawrct));
00214             ar->swap = WIN_NONE_OK;
00215         }
00216     }
00217 }
00218 
00219 static void wm_method_draw_overlap_all(bContext *C, wmWindow *win, int exchange)
00220 {
00221     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00222     bScreen *screen = win->screen;
00223     ScrArea *sa;
00224     ARegion *ar;
00225     static rcti rect = {0, 0, 0, 0};
00226 
00227     /* after backbuffer selection draw, we need to redraw */
00228     for (sa = screen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next)
00229         for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next)
00230             if (ar->swinid && !wm_area_test_invalid_backbuf(sa))
00231                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00232 
00233     /* flush overlapping regions */
00234     if (screen->regionbase.first) {
00235         /* flush redraws of area regions up to overlapping regions */
00236         for (sa = screen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next)
00237             for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next)
00238                 if (ar->swinid && ar->do_draw)
00239                     wm_flush_regions_up(screen, &ar->winrct);
00240         
00241         /* flush between overlapping regions */
00242         for (ar = screen->regionbase.last; ar; ar = ar->prev)
00243             if (ar->swinid && ar->do_draw)
00244                 wm_flush_regions_up(screen, &ar->winrct);
00245         
00246         /* flush redraws of overlapping regions down to area regions */
00247         for (ar = screen->regionbase.last; ar; ar = ar->prev)
00248             if (ar->swinid && ar->do_draw)
00249                 wm_flush_regions_down(screen, &ar->winrct);
00250     }
00251 
00252     /* flush drag item */
00253     if (rect.xmin != rect.xmax) {
00254         wm_flush_regions_down(screen, &rect);
00255         rect.xmin = rect.xmax = 0;
00256     }
00257     if (wm->drags.first) {
00258         /* doesnt draw, fills rect with boundbox */
00259         wm_drags_draw(C, win, &rect);
00260     }
00261     
00262     /* draw marked area regions */
00263     for (sa = screen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next) {
00264         CTX_wm_area_set(C, sa);
00265 
00266         for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00267             if (ar->swinid) {
00268                 if (ar->do_draw) {
00269                     CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar);
00270                     ED_region_do_draw(C, ar);
00271                     wm_paintcursor_draw(C, ar);
00272                     ED_area_overdraw_flush(sa, ar);
00273                     CTX_wm_region_set(C, NULL);
00274 
00275                     if (exchange)
00276                         ar->swap = WIN_FRONT_OK;
00277                 }
00278                 else if (exchange) {
00279                     if (ar->swap == WIN_FRONT_OK) {
00280                         CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar);
00281                         ED_region_do_draw(C, ar);
00282                         wm_paintcursor_draw(C, ar);
00283                         ED_area_overdraw_flush(sa, ar);
00284                         CTX_wm_region_set(C, NULL);
00285 
00286                         ar->swap = WIN_BOTH_OK;
00287                     }
00288                     else if (ar->swap == WIN_BACK_OK)
00289                         ar->swap = WIN_FRONT_OK;
00290                     else if (ar->swap == WIN_BOTH_OK)
00291                         ar->swap = WIN_BOTH_OK;
00292                 }
00293             }
00294         }
00295         
00296         wm_area_mark_invalid_backbuf(sa);
00297         CTX_wm_area_set(C, NULL);
00298     }
00299 
00300     /* after area regions so we can do area 'overlay' drawing */
00301     if (screen->do_draw) {
00302         ED_screen_draw(win);
00303 
00304         if (exchange)
00305             screen->swap = WIN_FRONT_OK;
00306     }
00307     else if (exchange) {
00308         if (screen->swap == WIN_FRONT_OK) {
00309             ED_screen_draw(win);
00310             screen->swap = WIN_BOTH_OK;
00311         }
00312         else if (screen->swap == WIN_BACK_OK)
00313             screen->swap = WIN_FRONT_OK;
00314         else if (screen->swap == WIN_BOTH_OK)
00315             screen->swap = WIN_BOTH_OK;
00316     }
00317 
00318     ED_area_overdraw(C);
00319 
00320     /* draw marked overlapping regions */
00321     for (ar = screen->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00322         if (ar->swinid && ar->do_draw) {
00323             CTX_wm_menu_set(C, ar);
00324             ED_region_do_draw(C, ar);
00325             CTX_wm_menu_set(C, NULL);
00326         }
00327     }
00328 
00329     if (screen->do_draw_gesture)
00330         wm_gesture_draw(win);
00331     
00332     /* needs pixel coords in screen */
00333     if (wm->drags.first) {
00334         wm_drags_draw(C, win, NULL);
00335     }
00336 }

00341 
00342 static void wm_method_draw_damage(bContext *C, wmWindow *win)
00343 {
00344     wm_method_draw_all(C, win);

00347 
00348 /****************** draw triple buffer ********************/
00349 /* - area regions are written into a texture, without any */
00350 /*   of the overlapping menus, brushes, gestures. these   */
00351 /*   are redrawn each time.                               */
00352 /*                                                        */
00353 /* - if non-power of two textures are supported, that is  */
00354 /*   used. if not, multiple smaller ones are used, with   */
00355 /*   worst case wasted space being 23.4% for 3x3 textures */
00356 
00357 #define MAX_N_TEX 3
00358 
00359 typedef struct wmDrawTriple {
00360     GLuint bind[MAX_N_TEX * MAX_N_TEX];
00361     int x[MAX_N_TEX], y[MAX_N_TEX];
00362     int nx, ny;
00363     GLenum target;
00364 } wmDrawTriple;
00365 
00366 static void split_width(int x, int n, int *splitx, int *nx)
00367 {
00368     int a, newnx, waste;
00369 
00370     /* if already power of two just use it */
00371     if (is_power_of_2_i(x)) {
00372         splitx[0] = x;
00373         (*nx)++;
00374         return;
00375     }
00376 
00377     if (n == 1) {
00378         /* last part, we have to go larger */
00379         splitx[0] = power_of_2_max_i(x);
00380         (*nx)++;
00381     }
00382     else {
00383         /* two or more parts to go, use smaller part */
00384         splitx[0] = power_of_2_min_i(x);
00385         newnx = ++(*nx);
00386         split_width(x - splitx[0], n - 1, splitx + 1, &newnx);
00387 
00388         for (waste = 0, a = 0; a < n; a++)
00389             waste += splitx[a];
00390 
00391         /* if we waste more space or use the same amount,
00392          * revert deeper splits and just use larger */
00393         if (waste >= power_of_2_max_i(x)) {
00394             splitx[0] = power_of_2_max_i(x);
00395             memset(splitx + 1, 0, sizeof(int) * (n - 1));
00396         }
00397         else
00398             *nx = newnx;
00399     }
00400 }
00401 
00402 static void wm_draw_triple_free(wmWindow *win)
00403 {
00404     if (win->drawdata) {
00405         wmDrawTriple *triple = win->drawdata;
00406 
00407         glDeleteTextures(triple->nx * triple->ny, triple->bind);
00408 
00409         MEM_freeN(triple);
00410 
00411         win->drawdata = NULL;
00412     }
00413 }
00414 
00415 static void wm_draw_triple_fail(bContext *C, wmWindow *win)
00416 {
00417     wm_draw_window_clear(win);
00418 
00419     win->drawfail = 1;
00420     wm_method_draw_overlap_all(C, win, 0);
00421 }
00422 
00423 static int wm_triple_gen_textures(wmWindow *win, wmDrawTriple *triple)
00424 {
00425     GLint maxsize;
00426     int x, y;
00427 
00428     /* compute texture sizes */
00429     if (GLEW_ARB_texture_rectangle || GLEW_NV_texture_rectangle || GLEW_EXT_texture_rectangle) {
00430         triple->target = GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB;
00431         triple->nx = 1;
00432         triple->ny = 1;
00433         triple->x[0] = win->sizex;
00434         triple->y[0] = win->sizey;
00435     }
00436     else if (GPU_non_power_of_two_support()) {
00437         triple->target = GL_TEXTURE_2D;
00438         triple->nx = 1;
00439         triple->ny = 1;
00440         triple->x[0] = win->sizex;
00441         triple->y[0] = win->sizey;
00442     }
00443     else {
00444         triple->target = GL_TEXTURE_2D;
00445         triple->nx = 0;
00446         triple->ny = 0;
00447         split_width(win->sizex, MAX_N_TEX, triple->x, &triple->nx);
00448         split_width(win->sizey, MAX_N_TEX, triple->y, &triple->ny);
00449     }
00450 
00451     /* generate texture names */
00452     glGenTextures(triple->nx * triple->ny, triple->bind);
00453 
00454     if (!triple->bind[0]) {
00455         /* not the typical failure case but we handle it anyway */
00456         printf("WM: failed to allocate texture for triple buffer drawing (glGenTextures).\n");
00457         return 0;
00458     }
00459 
00460     for (y = 0; y < triple->ny; y++) {
00461         for (x = 0; x < triple->nx; x++) {
00462             /* proxy texture is only guaranteed to test for the cases that
00463              * there is only one texture in use, which may not be the case */
00464             glGetIntegerv(GL_MAX_TEXTURE_SIZE, &maxsize);
00465 
00466             if (triple->x[x] > maxsize || triple->y[y] > maxsize) {
00467                 glBindTexture(triple->target, 0);
00468                 printf("WM: failed to allocate texture for triple buffer drawing "
00469                        "(texture too large for graphics card).\n");
00470                 return 0;
00471             }
00472 
00473             /* setup actual texture */
00474             glBindTexture(triple->target, triple->bind[x + y * triple->nx]);
00475             glTexImage2D(triple->target, 0, GL_RGB8, triple->x[x], triple->y[y], 0, GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, NULL);
00476             glTexParameteri(triple->target, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00477             glTexParameteri(triple->target, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00478             // glColor still used with this enabled?
00479             // glTexEnvi(triple->target, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_REPLACE);
00480             glBindTexture(triple->target, 0);
00481 
00482             /* not sure if this works everywhere .. */
00483             if (glGetError() == GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY) {
00484                 printf("WM: failed to allocate texture for triple buffer drawing (out of memory).\n");
00485                 return 0;
00486             }
00487         }
00488     }
00489 
00490     return 1;
00491 }
00492 
00493 static void wm_triple_draw_textures(wmWindow *win, wmDrawTriple *triple)
00494 {
00495     float halfx, halfy, ratiox, ratioy;
00496     int x, y, sizex, sizey, offx, offy;
00497 
00498     glEnable(triple->target);
00499 
00500     for (y = 0, offy = 0; y < triple->ny; offy += triple->y[y], y++) {
00501         for (x = 0, offx = 0; x < triple->nx; offx += triple->x[x], x++) {
00502             sizex = (x == triple->nx - 1) ? win->sizex - offx : triple->x[x];
00503             sizey = (y == triple->ny - 1) ? win->sizey - offy : triple->y[y];
00504 
00505             /* wmOrtho for the screen has this same offset */
00506             ratiox = sizex;
00507             ratioy = sizey;
00508             halfx = 0.375f;
00509             halfy = 0.375f;
00510 
00511             /* texture rectangle has unnormalized coordinates */
00512             if (triple->target == GL_TEXTURE_2D) {
00513                 ratiox /= triple->x[x];
00514                 ratioy /= triple->y[y];
00515                 halfx /= triple->x[x];
00516                 halfy /= triple->y[y];
00517             }
00518 
00519             glBindTexture(triple->target, triple->bind[x + y * triple->nx]);
00520 
00521             glColor3f(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00522             glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00523             glTexCoord2f(halfx, halfy);
00524             glVertex2f(offx, offy);
00525 
00526             glTexCoord2f(ratiox + halfx, halfy);
00527             glVertex2f(offx + sizex, offy);
00528 
00529             glTexCoord2f(ratiox + halfx, ratioy + halfy);
00530             glVertex2f(offx + sizex, offy + sizey);
00531 
00532             glTexCoord2f(halfx, ratioy + halfy);
00533             glVertex2f(offx, offy + sizey);
00534             glEnd();
00535         }
00536     }
00537 
00538     glBindTexture(triple->target, 0);
00539     glDisable(triple->target);
00540 }
00541 
00542 static void wm_triple_copy_textures(wmWindow *win, wmDrawTriple *triple)
00543 {
00544     int x, y, sizex, sizey, offx, offy;
00545 
00546     for (y = 0, offy = 0; y < triple->ny; offy += triple->y[y], y++) {
00547         for (x = 0, offx = 0; x < triple->nx; offx += triple->x[x], x++) {
00548             sizex = (x == triple->nx - 1) ? win->sizex - offx : triple->x[x];
00549             sizey = (y == triple->ny - 1) ? win->sizey - offy : triple->y[y];
00550 
00551             glBindTexture(triple->target, triple->bind[x + y * triple->nx]);
00552             glCopyTexSubImage2D(triple->target, 0, 0, 0, offx, offy, sizex, sizey);
00553         }
00554     }
00555 
00556     glBindTexture(triple->target, 0);
00557 }
00558 
00559 static void wm_method_draw_triple(bContext *C, wmWindow *win)
00560 {
00561     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00562     wmDrawTriple *triple;
00563     bScreen *screen = win->screen;
00564     ScrArea *sa;
00565     ARegion *ar;
00566     int copytex = 0, paintcursor = 1;
00567 
00568     if (win->drawdata) {
00569         glClearColor(0, 0, 0, 0);
00570         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00571 
00572         wmSubWindowSet(win, screen->mainwin);
00573 
00574         wm_triple_draw_textures(win, win->drawdata);
00575     }
00576     else {
00577         win->drawdata = MEM_callocN(sizeof(wmDrawTriple), "wmDrawTriple");
00578 
00579         if (!wm_triple_gen_textures(win, win->drawdata)) {
00580             wm_draw_triple_fail(C, win);
00581             return;
00582         }
00583     }
00584 
00585     triple = win->drawdata;
00586 
00587     /* draw marked area regions */
00588     for (sa = screen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next) {
00589         CTX_wm_area_set(C, sa);
00590 
00591         for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00592             if (ar->swinid && ar->do_draw) {
00593                 CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar);
00594                 ED_region_do_draw(C, ar);
00595                 ED_area_overdraw_flush(sa, ar);
00596                 CTX_wm_region_set(C, NULL);
00597                 copytex = 1;
00598             }
00599         }
00600         
00601         wm_area_mark_invalid_backbuf(sa);
00602         CTX_wm_area_set(C, NULL);
00603     }
00604 
00605     if (copytex) {
00606         wmSubWindowSet(win, screen->mainwin);
00607         ED_area_overdraw(C);
00608 
00609         wm_triple_copy_textures(win, triple);
00610     }
00611 
00612     /* after area regions so we can do area 'overlay' drawing */
00613     ED_screen_draw(win);
00614 
00615     /* draw overlapping regions */
00616     for (ar = screen->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00617         if (ar->swinid) {
00618             CTX_wm_menu_set(C, ar);
00619             ED_region_do_draw(C, ar);
00620             CTX_wm_menu_set(C, NULL);
00621             /* when a menu is being drawn, don't do the paint cursors */
00622             paintcursor = 0;
00623         }
00624     }
00625 
00626     /* always draw, not only when screen tagged */
00627     if (win->gesture.first)
00628         wm_gesture_draw(win);
00629 
00630     if (paintcursor && wm->paintcursors.first) {
00631         for (sa = screen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next) {
00632             for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00633                 if (ar->swinid == screen->subwinactive) {
00634                     CTX_wm_area_set(C, sa);
00635                     CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar);
00636 
00637                     /* make region ready for draw, scissor, pixelspace */
00638                     ED_region_set(C, ar);
00639                     wm_paintcursor_draw(C, ar);
00640 
00641                     CTX_wm_region_set(C, NULL);
00642                     CTX_wm_area_set(C, NULL);
00643                 }
00644             }
00645         }
00646 
00647         wmSubWindowSet(win, screen->mainwin);
00648     }
00649     
00650     /* needs pixel coords in screen */
00651     if (wm->drags.first) {
00652         wm_drags_draw(C, win, NULL);
00653     }
00654 
00655 }
00656 
00657 /****************** main update call **********************/
00658 
00659 /* quick test to prevent changing window drawable */
00660 static int wm_draw_update_test_window(wmWindow *win)
00661 {
00662     ScrArea *sa;
00663     ARegion *ar;
00664     int do_draw = 0;
00665 
00666     for (ar = win->screen->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00667         if (ar->do_draw_overlay) {
00668             wm_tag_redraw_overlay(win, ar);
00669             ar->do_draw_overlay = 0;
00670         }
00671         if (ar->swinid && ar->do_draw)
00672             do_draw = 1;
00673     }
00674 
00675     for (sa = win->screen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next) {
00676         for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00677             wm_region_test_render_do_draw(sa, ar);
00678 
00679             if (ar->swinid && ar->do_draw)
00680                 do_draw = 1;
00681         }
00682     }
00683 
00684     if (do_draw)
00685         return 1;
00686     
00687     if (win->screen->do_refresh)
00688         return 1;
00689     if (win->screen->do_draw)
00690         return 1;
00691     if (win->screen->do_draw_gesture)
00692         return 1;
00693     if (win->screen->do_draw_paintcursor)
00694         return 1;
00695     if (win->screen->do_draw_drag)
00696         return 1;
00697     
00698     return 0;
00699 }
00700 
00701 static int wm_automatic_draw_method(wmWindow *win)
00702 {
00703     /* Ideally all cards would work well with triple buffer, since if it works
00704      * well gives the least redraws and is considerably faster at partial redraw
00705      * for sculpting or drawing overlapping menus. For typically lower end cards
00706      * copy to texture is slow though and so we use overlap instead there. */
00707 
00708     if (win->drawmethod == USER_DRAW_AUTOMATIC) {
00709         /* ATI opensource driver is known to be very slow at this */
00710         if (GPU_type_matches(GPU_DEVICE_ATI, GPU_OS_UNIX, GPU_DRIVER_OPENSOURCE))
00711             return USER_DRAW_OVERLAP;
00712         /* also Intel drivers are slow */
00713         else if (GPU_type_matches(GPU_DEVICE_INTEL, GPU_OS_UNIX, GPU_DRIVER_ANY))
00714             return USER_DRAW_OVERLAP;
00715         else if (GPU_type_matches(GPU_DEVICE_INTEL, GPU_OS_WIN, GPU_DRIVER_ANY))
00716             return USER_DRAW_OVERLAP_FLIP;
00717         else if (GPU_type_matches(GPU_DEVICE_INTEL, GPU_OS_MAC, GPU_DRIVER_ANY))
00718             return USER_DRAW_OVERLAP_FLIP;
00719         /* Windows software driver darkens color on each redraw */
00720         else if (GPU_type_matches(GPU_DEVICE_SOFTWARE, GPU_OS_WIN, GPU_DRIVER_SOFTWARE))
00721             return USER_DRAW_OVERLAP_FLIP;
00722         else if (GPU_type_matches(GPU_DEVICE_SOFTWARE, GPU_OS_UNIX, GPU_DRIVER_SOFTWARE))
00723             return USER_DRAW_OVERLAP;
00724         /* drawing lower color depth again degrades colors each time */
00725         else if (GPU_color_depth() < 24)
00726             return USER_DRAW_OVERLAP;
00727         else
00728             return USER_DRAW_TRIPLE;
00729     }
00730     else
00731         return win->drawmethod;
00732 }
00733 
00734 void wm_tag_redraw_overlay(wmWindow *win, ARegion *ar)
00735 {
00736     /* for draw triple gestures, paint cursors don't need region redraw */
00737     if (ar && win) {
00738         if (wm_automatic_draw_method(win) != USER_DRAW_TRIPLE)
00739             ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00740         win->screen->do_draw_paintcursor = 1;
00741     }
00742 }
00743 
00744 void wm_draw_update(bContext *C)
00745 {
00746     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00747     wmWindow *win;
00748     int drawmethod;
00749 
00750     GPU_free_unused_buffers();
00751     
00752     for (win = wm->windows.first; win; win = win->next) {
00753         if (win->drawmethod != U.wmdrawmethod) {
00754             wm_draw_window_clear(win);
00755             win->drawmethod = U.wmdrawmethod;
00756         }
00757 
00758         if (wm_draw_update_test_window(win)) {
00759             CTX_wm_window_set(C, win);
00760             
00761             /* sets context window+screen */
00762             wm_window_make_drawable(C, win);
00763 
00764             /* notifiers for screen redraw */
00765             if (win->screen->do_refresh)
00766                 ED_screen_refresh(wm, win);
00767 
00768             drawmethod = wm_automatic_draw_method(win);
00769 
00770             if (win->drawfail)
00771                 wm_method_draw_overlap_all(C, win, 0);
00772             else if (drawmethod == USER_DRAW_FULL)
00773                 wm_method_draw_full(C, win);
00774             else if (drawmethod == USER_DRAW_OVERLAP)
00775                 wm_method_draw_overlap_all(C, win, 0);
00776             else if (drawmethod == USER_DRAW_OVERLAP_FLIP)
00777                 wm_method_draw_overlap_all(C, win, 1);
00778             else // if (drawmethod == USER_DRAW_TRIPLE)
00779                 wm_method_draw_triple(C, win);
00780 
00781             win->screen->do_draw_gesture = 0;
00782             win->screen->do_draw_paintcursor = 0;
00783             win->screen->do_draw_drag = 0;
00784         
00785             wm_window_swap_buffers(win);
00786 
00787             CTX_wm_window_set(C, NULL);
00788         }
00789     }
00790 }
00791 
00792 void wm_draw_window_clear(wmWindow *win)
00793 {
00794     bScreen *screen = win->screen;
00795     ScrArea *sa;
00796     ARegion *ar;
00797     int drawmethod = wm_automatic_draw_method(win);
00798 
00799     if (drawmethod == USER_DRAW_TRIPLE)
00800         wm_draw_triple_free(win);
00801 
00802     /* clear screen swap flags */
00803     if (screen) {
00804         for (sa = screen->areabase.first; sa; sa = sa->next)
00805             for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next)
00806                 ar->swap = WIN_NONE_OK;
00807         
00808         screen->swap = WIN_NONE_OK;
00809     }
00810 }
00811 
00812 void wm_draw_region_clear(wmWindow *win, ARegion *ar)
00813 {
00814     int drawmethod = wm_automatic_draw_method(win);
00815 
00816     if (ELEM(drawmethod, USER_DRAW_OVERLAP, USER_DRAW_OVERLAP_FLIP))
00817         wm_flush_regions_down(win->screen, &ar->winrct);
00818 
00819     win->screen->do_draw = 1;
00820 }
00821 
00822 void WM_redraw_windows(bContext *C)
00823 {
00824     wmWindow *win_prev = CTX_wm_window(C);
00825     ScrArea *area_prev = CTX_wm_area(C);
00826     ARegion *ar_prev = CTX_wm_region(C);
00827 
00828     wm_draw_update(C);
00829 
00830     CTX_wm_window_set(C, win_prev);
00831     CTX_wm_area_set(C, area_prev);
00832     CTX_wm_region_set(C, ar_prev);
00833 }
